wem_apptemplates.introductory: The intent of the Application Templates is to house the fixed-width, legacy applications for UPS.com. The templates utilize the responsive header and footer that will adapt to the users' viewports while maintaining a fixed width body area.

lsdown.introductory: The following pages will display in the event that LiveSite is down and cannot serve content from the CMS.

title.text: Angular 4 A26 Common Payment Component - Alt

nbsAngular.heading: Angular Code Base Last Updated: 03/09/2018
nbsAngular.copy: The following pages were created to illustrate the baseline HTML required in order to achieve an application UI that adheres to the UPS design standards.  Each state of a page is represented with a LTR and RTL version. The verious states are displayed with in page interactions and demo buttons.
